name: Hard The Lip Reader Quiz / Test | 'Seinfeld' - Season 5 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the SPF for the sunscreen that Jerry brings to the tennis game?
questions.explanation:
25.

	George is disappointed that Jerry didn't bring any sunscreen with a higher SPF, but Jerry tries to ignore him and watch the tennis match.  George also complains that the sunscreen isn't PABA free.  When Jerry tells George that he doesn't even know what PABA is, George says he knows enough to stay away from it.

questions.text: Who is watching the tennis match on TV?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	When George goes to the concession stand to get a bottle of sunscreen with a higher SPF, he gets a hot fudge sundae.  Meanwhile Kramer is in Jerry's apartment watching the game, and when it comes to intermission, there's a shot of George eating the sundae with a huge mess all over his face.

questions.text: When Elaine needs a company car to drive her to a meeting, who does the driver need to pick up after dropping Elaine off?
questions.explanation:
Tom Hanks.

	Elaine dreads having to use a company driver to go to a meeting since they talk so much, so she makes up a story that she's going deaf to shut him up.  When the radio asks the driver to pick up Tom Hanks after dropping off Elaine, she blows her cover by saying that she loves Tom Hanks.

questions.text: When Jerry plans a date with the deaf lines-woman, who claims that they know sign language?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	When Jerry tries to talk to the lines-woman, he assumes that she's just ignoring him, but she actually had no idea that he was even talking.  When she turns around, he asks if she's deaf, and she says that she is.  Jerry realizes she's a lip reader.  After, Kramer tells Jerry that he once had a deaf cousin, so he learned sign language.

questions.text: George and Gwen break up at Monk's Coffee Shop.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When his girlfriend gives George the 'It's not you, it's me' routine, George gets angry and tells her that if anything, it was him that forced them to break up since he invented the routine.  Everyone thought that their relationship was going well up to this point.  George feels that they broke up because of the hot fudge sundae incident.

questions.text: Who calls Jerry in this episode?
questions.explanation:
His father.

	Jerry's father calls to tell him that he saw George on TV for the tennis match.  Soon, everybody ends up finding out that George was shoveling the food into his face on national television.  Elaine even asks if someone taped it for her to watch.

questions.text: What is the name of the deaf lines-woman?
questions.explanation:
Laura.

	When George decides to have dinner with Jerry and Laura, Laura tells them that a couple is breaking up in the restaurant (with the 'it's not you, it's me' routine), and George gets the idea to have Laura read Gwen's lips at Todd's party to see what she's saying.  To talk without Laura hearing at dinner, Jerry and George often cover their lips with random things on the table.

questions.text: At what time was Jerry supposed to pick the lines-woman up for the party?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	When Laura agrees to read Gwen's lips at the party, Jerry takes her home and tells her to be ready for the car service at six, but she misreads him and assumes that he's saying 'sex' all the time.  She ends up leaving the car in disgust and Jerry has no idea what he's done.

questions.text: Does Kramer get the ball-boy position?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	When Kramer goes to the try-outs, be beats all of the younger contenders for the position and becomes the first ball-man.  The coaches told him that they never saw someone practice with so much gusto, so he got the job.

questions.text: Does Newman appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Much like everyone else, Newman wants to take advantage of the lip reader's 'powers'.  At the party, Kramer misreads the signs given by Laura, and there's a big argument ending with George getting hit in the eye.  Meanwhile, Kramer accidentally injures pro tennis player, Monica Seles while fulfilling his duties as ball-man.
